tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username STRING,
  email STRING,
  registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE login_activity (
  login_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  login_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  login_location STRING,
  login_success BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE activity_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  activity_type STRING,
  activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection (
  detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  anomaly_type STRING,
  anomaly_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE UserAnomaly (
    user_id INT,
    detection_id INT,
    anomaly_score FLOAT,
    anomaly_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserActivity(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (detection_id) REFERENCES AnomalyDetection(detection_id)
);
